tool_description: Records and maintains historical price data across all channels for audit trails, trend analysis, and compliance reporting.

product_ids.description: Products to record price history for

change_reason.description: Reason for price change: sync, promotion, competition, cost, or manual

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All input arrays must have the same length.
Invalid change reason: Use sync, promotion, competition, cost, or manual.
Invalid price data: Prices must be non-negative numbers.
usage: Provide product_ids, price_changes, previous_prices, and channels arrays along with change_reason to record price history events.

tracking_timestamp.description: When the price changes were recorded

average_change.description: Average price change across all products

change_summary.description: Summary of the price change event
